clinical_study.brief_title: An Italian Experience on Grade 3b Follicular Lymphoma
clinical_study.official_title: An Italian Experience on Grade 3b Follicular Lymphoma

lead_sponsor.agency: Azienda Ospedaliera Città della Salute e della Scienza di Torino

clinical_study.source: Azienda Ospedaliera Città della Salute e della Scienza di Torino

brief_summary.textblock:
Study purpose is to evaluate baseline clinical data, outcome after front-line Rituximab containing chemotherapy and survival in patients with grade 3b Follicular Lymphoma.
Also an histological central review is planned in order to re-assess baseline diagnosis according to new 2016 World Health Organization (WHO) criteria.

primary_outcome.time_frame: End of front-line treatment (evaluated from diagnosis up to 30 months)
primary_outcome.description: Number of patients who achieve Complete Response or Partial Response after treatment

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From first response to last follow-up for at least 2 years (up to 15 years)
secondary_outcome.description: Time from last response to nearest relapse or follow-up

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Date of last follow-up for at least 2 years (up to 15 years)
secondary_outcome.description: Time to last follow-up or death

study_pop.textblock: Adult patient with grade 3b Follicular Lymphoma treated with Rituximab containing chemotherapy as front-line treatment

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosis of grade 3b Follicular Lymphoma
- Age > 18 years
- Front-line treatment with Rituximab containing chemotherapy
- Availability of histological sample for central review
Exclusion Criteria:
- Other lymphoma diagnosis
